author: Aleksandar Grozdanoski
comment: Even when abroad, no matter where I am, I get to keep in touch with my family and friends thanks to this app. I even made my closest friends in different countries download and install it and we keep in touch easily, as clearly as if we were both using a landline phone. I even got a VoIP adapter to make the use of the Messagenet's free number even easier. My parents couldn't be happier. It's as easy as using a landline phone. We've been using this app and its services since at least 2013. We're still using it today. Thank you Messagenet! Really great app!

author: Peter Mannell
comment: Can't make it work. It's not just jumping through hoops. Needs an IT GENIUS to work out which hoops to jump through.

reply.author: Messagenet
reply.content: Dear user, it's strange because thousands of users consider the app very simple and functional without any expert support. You may have encountered specific issues and for this we immediately wrote to you by email and SMS. We have not received any answer at the moment.

author: Fabio Manera
comment: The app is fine, the service is fine. Small compatibility problems with some ip phone.

author: Giacomo Ferronato
comment: The best VoIP experience on the store!

author: Dave Mazzetti
comment: Can't do anything with this app

reply.author: Messagenet
reply.content: Dear user, the app description clearly indicates what application does. Our support team has contacted you by email for further details. Regards. Messagenet

author: Andrea Colaiacomo
comment: Does its job
Great app, I cannot do without it !

author: Kousik Mondal
comment: Useless

reply.author: Messagenet
reply.content: Dear user, as the app description clearly indicates what Mtalk does, could you briefly explain why you evaluate the app as useless? You may contact us at support@messagenet.it. Regards

author: Massimiliano D'Angelo
comment: I am using it with a VoIP iPhone number. My family and friends can call a landline number and I get the call on my mobile, no matter where I am (with data access). The application works very good in background, the voice quality is good under 3g and 4g connection.
title: Wonderful app

comment: No code for the free bonus which sucks. Ive been pressing resend but still get nothing. & the email is not even valid which is no help. Useful

reply.author: Messagenet
reply.content: Dear user, it's very likely that an error occurred with your mobile operator while delivering  the validation code sent by SMS. To solve the issue, please contact us at support@messagenet.it indicating which mobile number and email you have used for the subscribing procedure; also, check the spam folder of your email.

author: atan two
comment: I Luke it, simple but effective. It solved my problems to call foreign numbers. I recommend a try
Very good app. Cheap and functional. Sometimes the quality of not optimal but it is definitely worth a try

author: Ferdinand Gabriel
comment: DO NOT DOWNLOAD. THIS IS A TOTALLY USELESS APP. I HAVE BEEN TRYING TO GET FREE BONUS FOR ONE HOUR BUT IT DOES NOT SEND A VALIDATION CODE.

reply.author: Messagenet
reply.content: Dear user, it's very likely that an error occurred with your mobile operator while delivering  the validation code sent by SMS. To solve the issue, please contact us at support@messagenet.it indicating which mobile number and email you have used for the subscription procedure; also, check the spam folder of your email.

author: Faysal Mohamed
comment: Very poor, getting free number access not working. I've tried this app before and now although option is available for London not working.

reply.author: Messagenet
reply.content:
Dear user, there was a misunderstanding probably.
Free numbers are available either in UK (London) and Italy but their availability changes dynamically, specially for London landlines. You may contact us for more details at support@messagenet.it

author: Igor Menchetti
comment: People cannot call me when I have data connection. Why?

reply.author: Messagenet
reply.content:
Dear user,
our support team just contacted you by mail to analyze the issue you're experiencing. You may alternately contact us either at support@messagenet.it or directly by app using Options \ Help & info \ Send us feedback. Regards

reply.content: Dear user, please check your email spam folder. If you did not receive any email please send an email to support@messagenet.it. Thanks

comment: The test call is great and that I can be called from my own webpage it is great, it calls my smartphone and sound is great.

reply.author: Messagenet
reply.content: Dear user, thanks for your updated review.

comment: Great app and backend communication service. Cheap price, free number.

comment: Very nice apps for home calling I really like it..

reply.content: Dear user, please contact us at support@messagenet.it in case of issues. Alternatively, you may contact us directly from the app (Options - Help & info - Send us feedback). Regards

title: Will work from india?

author: Giulio Grosoli
comment: Very good!

author: Joe B ADE
comment: Does anyone know how to add landline number?

reply.author: Messagenet
reply.content: Dear user, you have to complete your registration first: use Options\Get bonus in app.Once your profile is ready, use Options\Add number to get either a FREE o SMART landline according to your needs.Refer to https://www.messagenet.com/en/voip/.Pls note that London landlines availability may change over time. Pls contact us to support@messagenet.it.

comment: Beautiful app and great service!!

author: Marco Ferrantini
comment: Terrific

author: MarcOcraM
comment: Very convenient for international calls, e.g. to your home country. And to get a fixed line number on your mobile. Low rates. Quality mostly good if on WiFi or good bandwidth. Makes it also possible to call special free-dial numbers (e.g. 800, 199, usually not accessible from abroad). Would be nice to get the option to call through Mtalk every time you make a standard call from your mobile, without the need to expressly enter the app beforehand.
title: Excellent

author: Emanuele Sisti
comment: I live abroad and this app really made my life simpler!
title: the best ever!

author: Matteo Raggi
comment: Ottima per telefonare e ricevere chiamate! Qualche consiglio per registrare le telefonate in uscita? Con il pollice è difficile rispondere o rifiutare le chiamate, bisogna usare l'indice.

reply.author: Messagenet
reply.content: G.le utente, la ringraziamo per la sua recensione; il nostro servizio di supporto l'ha conttatata via email per fornirle informazioni in merito alla sua richiesta; può anche contattarci dall'app (Impostazioni,Help&info,Segnala un problema) o scrivendo a support@messagenet.it

comment: It is not free call.

reply.author: Messagenet

Alternatively, you may contact us directly from the app (Options - Help & info - Send us feedback) or writing to support@messagenet.it. Regards
